name: Sure Hope There Isn't A Hole In My Spaceship!
name_original: Sure Hope There Isn't A Hole In My Spaceship!
description:
Ugh, morning already?
Yaaaawn-
Hm?

What's that noise
...

Well, better drag myself out of bed.

God I Sure Hope There Isn't A Hole In My Spaceship!

1.) Press '1'

2.) Or '2' to get started

Music: Security Breach by Eric Matyas

Edge of the Galaxy font by Quinn Davis Type
